img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 2

area.alt: A Lady white, within the Field
area.title: A Lady white, within the Field

area.alt: A Lady white, within the Field
area.title: A Lady white, within the Field

area.alt: A Lady white, within the Field
area.title: A Lady white, within the Field

area.alt: The tidy Breezes, with their Brooms—
area.title: The tidy Breezes, with their Brooms—

area.alt: The tidy Breezes, with their Brooms—
area.title: The tidy Breezes, with their Brooms—

area.alt: The neighbors do not yet suspect!
area.title: The neighbors do not yet suspect!

area.alt: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!
area.title: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!

area.alt: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!
area.title: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!

area.alt: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!
area.title: And yet, how still the Landscape stands!

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 3

area.alt: To fight aloud, is very brave—
area.title: To fight aloud, is very brave—

area.alt: To fight aloud, is very brave—
area.title: To fight aloud, is very brave—

area.alt: Who win, and nations do not see—
area.title: Who win, and nations do not see—

area.alt: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—
area.title: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—

area.alt: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—
area.title: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—

area.alt: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—
area.title: Rank after Rank, with Even feet—

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 4

area.alt: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—
area.title: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—

area.alt: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—
area.title: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—

area.alt: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—
area.title: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—

area.alt: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—
area.title: 'Houses'— So the Wise Men tell me—

area.alt: I dont know him; snugly built!
area.title: I dont know him; snugly built!

area.alt: I dont know him; snugly built!
area.title: I dont know him; snugly built!

area.alt: I dont know him; snugly built!
area.title: I dont know him; snugly built!

area.alt: I dont know him; snugly built!
area.title: I dont know him; snugly built!

area.alt: Could the children find the way there—
area.title: Could the children find the way there—

area.alt: Could the children find the way there—
area.title: Could the children find the way there—

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 5

area.alt: Tell me how far the morning leaps—
area.title: Tell me how far the morning leaps—

area.alt: How many trips the Tortoise makes—
area.title: How many trips the Tortoise makes—

area.alt: How many trips the Tortoise makes—
area.title: How many trips the Tortoise makes—

area.alt: How many cups the Bee partakes,
area.title: How many cups the Bee partakes,

area.alt: How many cups the Bee partakes,
area.title: How many cups the Bee partakes,

area.alt: Also, who laid the Rainbow's piers,
area.title: Also, who laid the Rainbow's piers,

area.alt: Who counts the wampum of the night
area.title: Who counts the wampum of the night

area.alt: Who built this little Alban House
area.title: Who built this little Alban House

area.alt: Who'll let me out some gala day
area.title: Who'll let me out some gala day

area.alt: But I tug childish at my bar—

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 10

area.alt: These are the days when Birds come back—
area.title: These are the days when Birds come back—

area.alt: These are the days when Birds come back—
area.title: These are the days when Birds come back—

area.alt: A very few— a Bird or two—
area.title: A very few— a Bird or two—

area.alt: A very few— a Bird or two—
area.title: A very few— a Bird or two—

area.alt: A very few— a Bird or two—
area.title: A very few— a Bird or two—

area.alt: These are the days when skies resume
area.title: These are the days when skies resume

area.alt: The old. old sophistries of June—
area.title: The old. old sophistries of June—

area.alt: The old. old sophistries of June—
area.title: The old. old sophistries of June—

area.alt: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.
area.title: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.

area.alt: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.
area.title: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.

area.alt: Till ranks of seeds their witness bear.
area.title: Till ranks of seeds their witness bear.

area.alt: And softly thro' the altered air
area.title: And softly thro' the altered air

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.
area.title: Oh fraud that cannnot cheat the Bee.

area.alt: Till ranks of seeds their witness bear.
area.title: Till ranks of seeds their witness bear.

area.alt: And softly thro' the altered air
area.title: And softly thro' the altered air

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—
area.title: Oh Last Communion in the Haze—

area.alt: And that side of the Haze—
area.title: And that side of the Haze—

area.alt: And that side of the Haze—
area.title: And that side of the Haze—

area.alt: Still, is the bustle in the Brook—
area.title: Still, is the bustle in the Brook—

area.alt: Still, is the bustle in the Brook—
area.title: Still, is the bustle in the Brook—

area.alt: Grant me, Oh Lord, a sunny mind—

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 13

area.alt: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—
area.title: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—

area.alt: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—
area.title: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—

area.alt: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—
area.title: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—

area.alt: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—
area.title: A poor— torn heart— a tattered heart—

area.alt: That sat it down to rest—
area.title: That sat it down to rest—

area.alt: Nor noticed that the Ebbing Day
area.title: Nor noticed that the Ebbing Day

area.alt: Nor noticed night did soft descend—
area.title: Nor noticed night did soft descend—

area.alt: Nor noticed night did soft descend—
area.title: Nor noticed night did soft descend—

area.alt: Tenderly took it up from toil
area.title: Tenderly took it up from toil

area.alt: Do the blue havens by the hand
area.title: Do the blue havens by the hand

img.alt: Image Map for Original Poem 14

area.alt: I turn my brimming Eyes away,
area.title: I turn my brimming Eyes away,

area.alt: The hands still hug the tardy glass—
area.title: The hands still hug the tardy glass—

area.alt: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—
area.title: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—

area.alt: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—
area.title: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—

area.alt: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—
area.title: The lips I w'd have cooled, Alas—

area.alt: I w'd as soon attempt to warm
area.title: as soon attempt to warm

area.alt: To whom this w'd have pointed me
area.title: To whom this w'd have pointed me

area.title: To whom this w'd have pointed me

area.alt: If, haply, any say to me
